Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. This exceptional item, valued at over $800000 to us, offers unparalleled capabilities and solutions tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its unique features and the expertise it brings to the table, we are extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $750000. We understand that the true value of this product may resonate differently based on your unique circumstances and objectives, so we encourage you to evaluate its potential impact on your operations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you and bringing this game-changing solution to your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
